channel.title: Opera: Battleground of the arts
channel.description:
A discussion series, hosted by Boris Goldovsky, that examines the welding together of music and drama, two distinct arts, into opera.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Opera in English
item.description: This program explores the issue of opera performed in English.
item.dc:creator: Goldovsky, Boris
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: The dominance of the singer
item.description: This program focuses on the dominant role that the singer plays in opera.
item.dc:creator: Goldovsky, Boris
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: Common complaints
item.description: This program focuses on some of the common criticisms of opera.
item.dc:creator: Goldovsky, Boris
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: Singing actors
item.description: This program focuses on how opera singers may be trained to perform in productions that do not sacrifice theatrical value for the sake of musical value.
item.dc:creator: Goldovsky, Boris
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: The dramatic role of the orchestra
item.description: This program focuses on the essential dramatic role that the orchestra plays in opera.
item.dc:creator: Goldovsky, Boris
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: Dramatic function of the voice
item.description: This program focuses on the dramatic function of the voice in opera.
item.dc:creator: Goldovsky, Boris
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: Opera in our time
item.description: This program focuses on the elements necessary for a good opera performance.
item.dc:creator: Goldovsky, Boris
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: What is opera?
item.description: This program seeks to provide a definition for opera.
item.dc:creator: Goldovsky, Boris
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: The music of opera
item.description: This program focuses on the music that accompanies the singing in opera.
item.dc:creator: Goldovsky, Boris
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: Ersatz opera
item.description: This program focuses on some of the problems that beset operas and those who produce them.
item.dc:creator: Goldovsky, Boris
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: Discussions, opinions and judgments
item.description: This program focuses on the variety of opinions that exist about opera.
item.dc:creator: Goldovsky, Boris
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: Importance of scene design
item.description: The role of scene design in the essence of opera.
item.dc:creator: Goldovsky, Boris
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: Modern technology in the opera house
item.description: This program focuses on the ways that technology is used to enhance the opera experience.
item.dc:creator: Goldovsky, Boris
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts
